short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the 'Game Hero' image on NBA.com game replays that spoils the result of the game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you want to watch an NBA game in replay at NBA.com, you will be shown an image of the "Game Hero" right before the video starts. This is pretty annoying if you don't want to get spoiled the result as the Game Hero is always a player of the winning team.
This extension hides this image and replace it with a spoil free one I designed myself.
